notes: Plan 03-01 targets apps/cloud (Next.js 15 App Router). Server-first rendering baseline. Clerk auth pages use catch-all routes with Clerk hosted UI components. Dashboard layout uses client components for sidebar interactivity and Clerk UserButton/OrganizationSwitcher. Landing page is a pure server component. Tailwind v4 with @import syntax. shadcn/ui new-york style components available.
